Hiding and showing (do it yourself)

For the video, goto https://youtu.be/VfIUQ1AxC3s

Write code in SaxonJS sothat the first button shows the first html div (and hides the others). The second button should show the second div... you'll get the idea..

If you are in trouble, you will find the solution in the file hiding-and-showing-diy_1_.xslt.

If you have time for some extra vanilla, change the class of the active button (the one that was pressed) to active and remove the class (or just its value) from the other buttons.

You will find the solution in the file hiding-and-showing-diy_2_.xslt
